name: ogbn-products

ogb_leaderboard.note: From OGB official leaderboard (Hu et al. 2020)

analysis.note: Our simple Label Propagation (21.9%) underperforms due to 47-class complexity

conclusion: SPI correctly predicted that ogbn-products (h=0.81, SPI=0.62) is in Trust Region where GNNs should help. OGB leaderboard confirms GraphSAGE outperforms MLP by +17.3%.
